name: New Normal (HarmoMo)
description:
This game was made for GameOff 2022. The theme is cliché. 

This game's cliché is "New Normal."

People have been saying "new normal" ever since 2019 and we all know why.

It's been a constant battle to adjust to the new normals.

Hope you enjoy this game!

CONTROLS:

WASD - movements

SPACE - Roll

Black loading screen might take some time based on the browse, so I also uploaded an EXE file.
